Name: Kingdom vs Zombies
About the game: Build a flourishing kingdom , equip powerful armors and improve your character! Build different buildings (Wizard Tower, Ballista Tower, Great Hall, Barracks...) and upgrade them to defend your Castle . Find mighty equipments ( Swords, Helmets, Armors ) and be the shiny hero who saves the empire. Control your Hero , slash your enemies, defeat thousands of monsters !
Meta Title: Kingdom vs Zombies: Apr 26, 2020, Adam Cs and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Kingdom vs Zombies? Check out the release date (Apr 26, 2020), developer insights from Adam Cs, and a complete game summary.
